pr_title: [HUDI-995] Move TestRawTripPayload and HoodieTestDataGenerator to hudi-common

timeline.bodyText: moved this to a separate class file; it needs to stay in hudi-client
timeline.author: xushiyan

timeline.bodyText: An example of benefit from the class move
timeline.author: xushiyan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,8 +47,7 @@
 import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertArrayEquals;
 
 /**
- * Tests {@link InLineFileSystem} with Parquet writer and reader. hudi-common can't access HoodieTestDataGenerator.
- * Hence keeping this test in hudi-utilities.
+ * Tests for {@link InLineFileSystem} with Parquet writer and reader.
  */
